summary: "Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor" is an action-adventure video game set between "The Hobbit" and "The Lord of the Rings" movies. You play as Talion, a Gondorian Ranger, who teams up with an Elf Lord's spirit to avenge their losses. The game has cool combat and special powers, plus a unique "Nemesis System" where enemies remember you. It was made by Monolith Productions and came out in 2014, winning big awards and leading to a sequel, "Shadow of War," in 2017.
title: Middle-earth Shadow of Mordor
